message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper proposes a post-processing approach that uses natural language processing techniques to improve scene text recognition accuracy. 
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - The paper deals with scene text recognition, which is a subfield of computer vision. 
3. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper proposes a method that combines deep learning with natural language processing to improve the performance of a scene text recognition system. 
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper uses a deep neural network and word frequencies to re-rank text hypotheses, which is a machine learning task. 
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper deals with improving the accuracy of text recognition, which is a task related to information retrieval.
